events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case was categorized under Refund after identifying the customer’s request for money back due to wrong item received.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund case for the returned incorrect product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you process the refund smoothly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and expedite your refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345. I have attached a photo of the item here showing it does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you instructions to return the incorrect item at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and the free return label offer.
The refund process has been completed on our end. You should see the amount credited back to your account within 3-5 business days.
We’re following up to ensure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
